channel.title: Who would you want to run a server?
channel.description:
If you could choose one person to run a server right now who would it be, what kind of server.. and why?
Reason this is being posted is because it will give an insight on what players want to see from a future server.
If the person is not listed and comes up multiple times ill add it.

item.title: Who would you want to run a server?
item.dc:creator: @MubbY-Donskiie MubbY-Donskiie
item.description:
@MubbY-Donskiie wrote:

Reines sounds like a cool server owner.

Read full topic
item.source: Who would you want to run a server?

item.title: Who would you want to run a server?
item.dc:creator: @Protosstribe object
item.description:
@Protosstribe wrote:

It wouldn’t really be a problem if everyone had the same vision and goal, all aspects or concepts of the software were decoupled as much as possible and you were all utilizing for instance continuous integration. If this was true, you could talk about what you are currently going to implement, on some private forum (or whatever), so the other project-members could focus on something else instead. But the tricky part would be that everyone must understand why the architecture is designed in the way it is, so less redundant code is added etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Who would you want to run a server?

item.title: Who would you want to run a server?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

If you cant manage your source code with a system built to manage your code, then you’re doing something wrong.

Read full topic
